league_of_legends.name: League of Legends
league_of_legends.description: Team-based strategy game where two teams of five champions compete to destroy the enemy Nexus. Features over 160 champions across roles.
league_of_legends.competitive_scene: LCS, LEC, LCK, LPL — one of the biggest esports globally

current_meta.meta_summary: Tank-heavy top lane meta. Jungle favors early aggression. Mid is mage-focused with Aurora S-tier. ADC is hypercarry-friendly.
tips: Aim for 8+ CS per minute as a laner
Ward the river at 3:15 for first jungle gank timing
Prioritize dragon control after first tower
Split pushing is more effective than teamfighting in low elo
Master 2-3 champions deeply rather than 20 at a surface level

beginner_tips: Start with simple champions: Garen (top), Master Yi (jungle), Annie (mid)
Focus on last-hitting minions — this is the #1 skill gap in low elo
Always buy Control Wards on every back

valorant.name: Valorant
valorant.description: Character-based tactical shooter combining precise gunplay with unique agent abilities. Teams alternate attacking and defending.

current_meta.meta_summary: Double controller meta. Cypher dominant after buffs. Jett top duelist. Viper must-pick on Breeze and Icebox.
tips: Crosshair placement at head level is king
Don't run and shoot — counter-strafing is essential
Learn 2-3 agents per role for flexibility
Use utility BEFORE peeking, not after
Full save after pistol loss, force on round 3 if you won pistol

beginner_tips: Start with Sage or Reyna — simple abilities, self-sustain
Practice in the Range for 10 min daily
Learn callouts for your 2 most-played maps
Don't crouch spray — makes your head easier to hit
Communicate with your team — even basic info wins rounds

minecraft.name: Minecraft
minecraft.description: Open-world sandbox game where players mine resources, craft items, and build in a procedurally generated 3D block world.

current_meta.meta_summary: 1.21 added Trial Chambers and the Mace weapon. Survival meta focuses on efficient farms and elytra travel.
tips: Build an iron farm early for infinite tools and armor
Always carry a water bucket — MLG water saves lives
Villager trading halls are extremely powerful in survival
Use beds to skip night rather than fighting mobs early
Strip mining at Y=-59 is most efficient for diamonds

beginner_tips: First day: punch trees → workbench → wooden pickaxe → mine stone → shelter before night
Don't dig straight down — you'll fall into lava
Torches prevent mob spawning — light up your base
Craft a bed ASAP with 3 wool and 3 planks
Find a village for easy food and trading

fortnite.name: Fortnite
fortnite.description: Battle royale where 100 players fight to be last standing, featuring building mechanics and frequent crossover events.

current_meta.meta_summary: Building is back as core mechanic. Shotgun meta with Pump dominant. Late game is about height advantage.
tips: Learn basic 90s and ramp rushes — building wins fights
Always carry shotgun + AR + heals
Land at named POIs for better loot
Use audio cues — footsteps tell you everything
Rotate early to avoid storm

cs2.name: Counter-Strike 2
cs2.description: The definitive competitive tactical shooter with round-based matches, an economy system, and precise gunplay.

current_meta.meta_summary: AK-47 and M4A1-S dominant. Utility more important than ever with volumetric smoke changes.
tips: Learn AK spray pattern — first 10 bullets should be muscle memory
Utility wins rounds more than aim — learn 3 smokes per map
Play for crossfires — avoid fair 1v1s
Economy is a team decision — buy and save together
Watch pro demos for positioning and rotations

apex_legends.name: Apex Legends
apex_legends.description: Fast-paced battle royale with unique character abilities and advanced movement mechanics.

current_meta.meta_summary: Movement legends remain popular. Wingman and R-301 are top weapons. Aggressive play rewarded.
tips: Master sliding and bunny hopping — movement is everything
Armor swapping mid-fight is essential
Always carry a Wingman or Peacekeeper for close range
Rotate early using balloons and jump towers
Ping system eliminates the need for voice comms

tft.name: Teamfight Tactics
tft.description: Auto battler where players draft champions, build team compositions with synergies, and manage economy.

current_meta.meta_summary: Reroll comps strong early game. Level 8 fast is standard for high-cost carries. Econ augments are flexible.
tips: Don't roll before level 7 unless playing a reroll comp
Econ to 50 gold and stay there — interest is king
Scout other boards to avoid contested comps
Position carry in back corner with frontline
Augment selection should match current items, not dream comp

deadlock.name: Deadlock
deadlock.description: Valve's hybrid MOBA-shooter with heroes, lane mechanics, soul farming, and base destruction.

current_meta.meta_summary: Early access. Rewards hybrid aim + ability usage. Farming souls efficiently is critical. Items have massive impact.
tips: Focus on soul farming in lane — denying enemy souls is huge
Buy items that complement your hero's kit
Learn to use vertical space with ziplines
Objectives are more important than kills
This is a MOBA first, shooter second — macro wins games
